kb3.name: kb3_pilots
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_pilots` ( `plt_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `plt_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `plt_crp_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `plt_externalid` int(11) default NULL, `plt_updated` datetime default NULL, `plt_kpoints` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `plt_lpoints` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (`plt_id`), UNIQUE KEY `plt_name` (`plt_name`), KEY `plt_externalid` (`plt_externalid`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci;
